These would be the children of his sisters (Alice's father's sisters). So, Alice's sister has 5 cousins from her father's side.  7. The brother of Alice's father also has 2 sons. These are also Alice's sister's cousins from her father's side.  Let's double-check: - Alice's sister has 6 cousins from her mother's side (children of her mother's brothers). - Alice's sister has 5 cousins from her father's side (children of her father's sisters). - Alice's sister has 2 more cousins from her father's side (sons of her father's brother).  So, the total number of cousins Alice's sister has is: 6 (from mother's side) + 5 (from father's side) + 2 (sons of father's brother) = 13  ### Answer: Alice's sister has 13 cousins.
